text: Ara wit kɨrɨs pɨrɨ simbɨyɨ simbɨyɨ kɨrɨvu tɨmba naŋga vɨrañɨ mɨŋgaramata sarɨwayɨŋandi tɨmɨravarami maña handa, kru Gotɨndu kuyu avivi sarɨwayɨŋandi indarɨta kɨnzɨhɨnzɨtɨndi. Hara nuŋandɨ indarɨmaŋgaramaŋgara vana ha wit kɨrɨs kundur manɨman maña, harɨm nuŋandɨ indarɨmaŋgamaŋgara vana ha pakanda kɨndi. Gotɨndu kuyu avivi indarɨta kɨnzɨhɨnzɨtɨndi. Hara kru nuŋandɨ indarɨmaŋgaramaŋgara vana haŋandɨhinɨrɨm pɨmɨ ŋguhu, nuŋandɨ indarɨmaŋgaramaŋgara vana ha mɨŋgata yɨvundi.
